Description.Text: Placed in the city of Manhattan and surrounded by attractive tourist spots, Holiday Inn Express NYC Madison Square Garden welcomes travelers to enjoy the modern lodging offered to them. Some of the places of interest close to this inn are Empire State Building, which features most popular outdoor observatories and Madison Square Garden, famous for hosting concerts, hockey games and ice shows. Guests can enjoy shopping at Gansevoort Market, which incorporates furnishing boutiques, restaurants and nightclubs. Holiday Inn Express NYC Madison Square Garden's ideal location allows guests to visit Broadway Theatre in Manhattan and Forbes Magazine Galleries.

• Fashion Institute of Technology - 0.2 km / 0.1 mi • Madison Square Garden - 0.2 km / 0.1 mi • Macy's - 0.6 km / 0.4 mi • The Institute of Culinary Education - 0.7 km / 0.4 mi • Empire State Building - 0.7 km / 0.4 mi • Madison Square Park - 0.8 km / 0.5 mi • Times Square - 1.1 km / 0.7 mi • Broadway - 1.3 km / 0.8 mi • Grand Central Terminal - 1.4 km / 0.9 mi • Chrysler Building - 1.6 km / 1 mi • Rockefeller Plaza - 1.8 km / 1.1 mi • Central Park - 4.6 km / 2.9 mi • Brooklyn Bridge - 5 km / 3.1 mi • Ellis Island - 6.7 km / 4.2 mi • Statue of Liberty - 7.8 km / 4.9 mi

All guestrooms are equipped with cable/satellite televisions with premium channels and in-room movies. Complimentary high-speed Internet access is available. Rooms are also outfitted with multi-line phones with voicemail, coffee/tea makers, and iron/ironing boards. Beds come with a choice of four pillow types. Bathrooms are equipped with hair dryers.

This property is located in the heart of Chelsea, just steps away from Times Square. The Holiday Inn Express Madison Square Garden Area offers complimentary high-speed Internet access in the hotel’s public areas and guestrooms.An off-site fitness center is available to hotel guests for a discount. A business center is also available. A free buffet breakfast is provided each morning.

From LaGuardia Airport(LGA): Distance: 9 MI / 14.48 KM Time by taxi: 20 Minutes Time by train: 40 Minutes Grand Central Parkway West, BQE Expressway exit #4 to Verrazano Bridge, Merge to BQE I-278W, I-495 exit #35 thru Midtown Tunnel, keep left, right onto East 35th, left onto 7th Ave, right onto West 29th.
From Penn Station: From Penn Station 8th Avenue follow 31st Street to 9th Avenue, left onto 9th Avenue, left onto 30th Street, right onto 7th Avenue and a right on 29th Street.

There is no on-site restaurant,But the guests of Holiday Inn Express in New York are served with a delicious breakfast at the relaxing atmosphere of the breakfast room. They can also enjoy tasting different flavours of food at the nearby restaurants namely Mustang Harry and Dominos Pizza.
Great value and world-class quality reside here at the Holiday Inn Express Chelsea/Madison Square Garden ; which will exceed all your expectations
